content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to live data or information about upcoming events. However, the location of the upcoming PGA Championship will likely have an impact on the players. The course design, weather conditions, altitude, and type of grass used on the course will all influence the players' strategies and performance. For example, if the course is located in an area known for high winds or sudden weather changes, players will need to adjust their tactics accordingly. Additionally, if the course has narrow fairways or numerous hazards, players will need to be careful with their shots and adjust their play accordingly. Finally, if the grass type used on the course is one that the players are not used to, this could also impact how they perform. Ultimately, the location of the upcoming PGA Championship will have a significant impact on the players and the outcome of the tournament, and it will be interesting to see how they adapt to the course and its challenges.
